message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. It's a great value considering its worth to you is $150.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. It's a great product, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $100? That's still above the product's worth to me, but it's closer to what you're comfortable with.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. It's a great product, and I really want to make a deal with you.
Considering your interest in the product, how about we settle at $97? This price reflects a compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit for me.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, how about we agree on $94? This price allows for a fair transaction for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $92.50. This is the lowest I can go, but I really want to make a deal with you.
